    public interface IMessageSource
extends IMessageProcessor
    Source of IMessage's.

    Any IMessage's generated are sent to any registered IMessageListeners.

    The details of how and when a listener is notified of a new message are encapsulated in a ISelectableListenerEntry.

      • addMessageListenerEntry

        void addMessageListenerEntry(ISelectableListenerEntry listenerEntry)
        Registers the given listener as a receiver of generated IMessages.

        If the same listener is added more than once it will be notified more than once.

        Parameters:
        listenerEntry - Contains selectable listener entries for IMessageListener's.

      • getMessageListenerEntries
